title: Uniswap Swap
longDescription:
1. Click the Enroll button below.  
2. Navigate to [Uniswap's trading site.](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?use=V2)  
3. Connect your favorite wallet such as [Metamask](https://metamask.io/) 
4. Select the token and amount you wish to sell  
5. Select UNI as the token you want to buy, confirm you’ve okay with the swap price, and click Swap 
6. Confirm you’re okay with the details of your swap and click Confirm Swap 
7. Confirm the transaction from your wallet. Uniswap will wait for confirmation before proceeding. 
8. Wait for the transaction to be confirmed. Your can check the status on Etherscan Explorer 
9. Add the tokens to your wallet once the transaction is confirmed 
10. The tokens are now in your wallet! 
11. Come back here and click Claim.  
12. You should see your reward in minutes!
